paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Client-focused Approach
detailsData.content: We prioritize the needs and goals of our clients, ensuring personalized attention and tailored legal solutions.

detailsData.title: Transparent Communication
detailsData.content: We believe in open and honest communication with our clients, providing clarity and understanding throughout the legal process.

detailsData.title: Community Advocacy
detailsData.content: Committed to serving the community, we engage in public-interest litigation to protect taxpayers and promote government transparency.

valueProp: Briggs Law Corporation is dedicated to providing high-quality legal representation to small businesses, non-profit organizations, and concerned citizens. Our commitment to transparency, accountability, and community advocacy sets us apart.

testimonalData.text: Briggs Law Corp. is very professional and friendly. Excellent attorney and staff.
testimonalData.author: Michael T.

testimonalData.text: Cory Briggs has been helpful to my family and business. Great advice and direction.
testimonalData.author: Larry W.

testimonalData.text: Over the past months that I have worked with Cory Briggs, I have found him to be extremely knowledgeable, ethical, and dedicated.
testimonalData.author: Andrea S.
